Name: Safety
Description: Protects from Instant Death, Warp, Bubble, and gravity damage.

Name: Ignore Evasion
Description: Bypass the enemy's evasion when attacking.

Name: Tactician
Description: Increases evasion and magick evasion if the enemy has a shield.

Name: Alert
Description: Increases evasion by 25 if evasion is greater than 0.

Name: Improved Counter
Description: Counter attack at a more signficant rate.

Name: Spellbreaker
Description: Increases magick power when HP Critical.

Name: Brawler
Description: Attack power when fighting empty-handed becomes dependant on level.

Name: Focus
Description: Increases strength when HP is full.

Name: Trigger Happy
Description: Improves chance to score multiple hits.

Name: Pharmacology
Description: Improves potency of recovery items like potions.

Name: Toxicology
Description: Reverses the effects of recovery items when used.

Name: Geomancy
Description: Weather effects have no effect on attacks.

Name: Master Thief
Description: Enables the theft of superior and rare items.

Name: Saboteur
Description: Bypass the enemy's vitality when casting magick.

Name: Warmage
Description: Gain MP after dealing magick damage.

Name: Headsman
Description: Gain MP after defeating a foe.

Name: Treasure Hunter
Description: Obtain superior items from chests, coffers, and the like.

Name: Spendthrift
Description: Enables casting of magicks with gil, rather than MP.

Name: Invisible
Description: Invisible to enemies who detect sound and magick.

Name: Critical Invisible
Description: Invisible to enemies who detect low HP.

Name: Mental Discipline
Description: Magicks cost half normal MP cost.

Name: Gelatinous
Description: Damage from guns and measures reduced by 88%.

Name: Reckless
Description: Attack damage doubled, but user takes damage inflicted.

Name: Soulbind
Description: Enemy receives 5% of damage dealt to user.

Name: Shield Block 2
Description: Increases chance to block with a shield by $n$%.

Name: Shield Block 1
Description: Increases chance to block with a shield by $n$%.

Name: Serenity
Description: Increases magick power when HP is full.

Name: Remedy Lore 3
Description: Remedies remove Stop, Doom, and Disease.

Name: Remedy Lore 2
Description: Remedies remove Petrify, Confuse, and Oil.

Name: Remedy Lore 1
Description: Remedies remove Sleep, Sap, Immobilize, and Disable.

Name: Phoenix Lore 2
Description: Phoenix Downs restores more HP by 20%.

Name: Phoenix Lore 1
Description: Phoenix Downs restores more HP by 10%.
